details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: WCAG 2.1 - 4.1 Compatible - 4.1.2 Name, Role, Value - List
details.description: A table element is incorrectly tagged as a list element or a list has the wrong numbering

rule.description: A table element is incorrectly tagged as a list element or a list has the wrong numbering
rule.test: hasLowestDepthError == false || (correctType != 'TD' && correctType != 'TR' && correctType != 'TH' && correctType != 'TBody' && correctType != 'THead' && correctType != 'TFoot' && correctType != 'Table') || (standardType != 'L' && standardType != 'LI' && standardType != 'Lbl' && standardType != 'LBody')
